Detailed Description

template<class VECTOR = Vector<double>>
class mg::Matrix< VECTOR >

Multilevel matrix. This matrix stores an MGLevelObject of PointerMatrixBase objects. It implementes the interface defined in MGMatrixBase, so that it can be used as a matrix in Multigrid.

Author
Guido Kanschat
Date
2002, 2010
